conbody.p: uses an LVM thin pool to store tenant (application) data. LVM thin pools include separate storage areas for data and for metadata. For each tenant it manages, maintains a separate virtual device in the data storage area of its LVM thin pool.

To ensure consistency, requires the following, minimum amount of free space in its thin pool:
3GB in the data storage area
62MB in the metadata storage area
3GB for each tenant virtual device So, if is managing two applications, it requires a minimum of 62MB of free space in the metadata storage area of its LVM thin pool and 6GB of storage in the data storage area.
